00021 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodSqlExprReport.h"
00022 
00023 using namespace std;
00024 
00025 QuantMethodSqlExprReport::QuantMethodSqlExprReport(const std::string &databaseFile, const std::string &tableName, int maxLength) {
00026   m_DbFileName = databaseFile;
00027   m_TableName = tableName;
00028   m_TableMetaName = tableName + "_meta";
00029   m_MaxPsNameLength = maxLength;
00030   int status = 0;
00031   if ((status =  sqlite3_open(databaseFile.c_str(), &m_Db)) != SQLITE_OK) {
00032     Err::errAbort("Couldn't open database: " + databaseFile + " got error code: " + ToStr(status));
00033   }
00034 }
00035 
00036 QuantMethodSqlExprReport::~QuantMethodSqlExprReport() {
00037   int status = 0;
00038   // Close the sqlite database 
00039   if ((status = sqlite3_close(m_Db)) != SQLITE_OK) {
00040    Verbose::warn(0, "Error trying to close the database with error code: " + ToStr(status));
00041   }
00042 }
00043 
00044 bool QuantMethodSqlExprReport::prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart) {
00045   createSummaryTable(m_Db, m_TableName, iMart);
00046   string sql = "begin transaction;";
00047   execute(m_Db, sql);
00048   return true;
00049 }
00050 
00051 bool QuantMethodSqlExprReport::report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00052                                       QuantMethod &qMethod, 
00053                                       const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00054                                       std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00055                                       PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) {
00056   static char buf[256];
00057   static string delim = ",";
00058   if(psGroup.probeSets[0]->psType != ProbeSet::Expression && psGroup.probeSets[0]->psType != ProbeSet::Copynumber) {
00059     return false;
00060   }
00061   QuantExprMethod* qeMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantExprMethod *>(&qMethod);
00062   if(qeMethod == NULL) {
00063     Err::errAbort("Can't call QuantMethodSqlExprReport::report() with something other than a QuantExprMethod.");
00064   }
00065   int targetCount = qeMethod->getNumTargets();
00066 
00067   string insert = "insert into " + m_TableName + " values ( '" + psGroup.name + "' ";
00068   for(int i = 0; i < targetCount; i++) {
00069     snprintf(buf, ArraySize(buf), "%.4g", qeMethod->getSignalEstimate(i));
00070     insert += delim + buf;
00071   }
00072   insert += ");";
00073   execute(m_Db, insert);
00074 
00075   return true;
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 void QuantMethodSqlExprReport::createSummaryTable(sqlite3 *db, const std::string &tableName, const IntensityMart &iMart) {
00080   string createSql = "create table " + tableName + " ( probeset_id varchar(" + ToStr(m_MaxPsNameLength) + ") , ";
00081   for(int i = 0; i < iMart.getCelFileNames().size(); i++) {
00082     createSql += " '" + iMart.getCelFileNames()[i] + "' real ";
00083     if(i + 1 != iMart.getCelFileNames().size()) {
00084       createSql += ",";
00085     }
00086   }
00087   createSql += " );";
00088   execute(db, createSql);
00089 }
00090 
00091 void QuantMethodSqlExprReport::createMetaTable(sqlite3 *db, const std::string &metaTableName) {
00092   string createSql = "create table " + metaTableName + " ( key varchar(256), value text ); ";
00093   execute(db, createSql);
00094 }

00097 
00098 void QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(sqlite3 *db, const string &sql) {
00099   
00100   sqlite3_stmt *stmt = NULL;  
00101   int status = 0;
00102     if ((status = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, sql.c_str(), sql.size(), &stmt, NULL)) != SQLITE_OK) {
00103       Err::errAbort("Error error code: " + ToStr(status) + " preparing statement: " + sql);
00104     }
00105     
00106     if ((status = sqlite3_step(stmt)) != SQLITE_DONE) {
00107       Err::errAbort("Error error code: " + ToStr(status) + " executing statement: " + sql);
00108     }
00109     
00110     if ((status = sqlite3_finalize(stmt)) != SQLITE_OK) {
00111       Err::errAbort("Error error code: " + ToStr(status) + " finalizing statement: " + sql);
00112     }
00113 }
00114 
00115 bool QuantMethodSqlExprReport::finish(QuantMethod &qMethod) {
00116     string sql = "commit;";
00117     execute(m_Db, sql);
00118     string index = "create index summary_index on summary (probeset_id);";
00119     execute(m_Db, index);
00120     return true;
00121 }
00122 
00123 void QuantMethodSqlExprReport::addStdHeaders(QuantMethodReport *qReport,
00124                                              const std::string& execGuid, 
00125                                              const std::string& reportGuid,
00126                                              const std::string& timeStr,
00127                                              const std::string& commandLine,
00128                                               const std::string& execVersion,
00129                                              const AnalysisInfo& info) {
00130   std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator keyIx, paramIx;
00131   createMetaTable(m_Db, m_TableMetaName);
00132   string sql = "begin transaction;";
00133   execute(m_Db, sql);
00134   //
00135   for(keyIx = info.m_ParamNames.begin(), paramIx = info.m_ParamValues.begin();
00136       keyIx != info.m_ParamNames.end() && paramIx != info.m_ParamValues.end();
00137       ++keyIx, ++paramIx) {
00138     string sql = "insert into " + m_TableMetaName + " values ( '" + *keyIx + "', '" + *paramIx + "');";
00139     execute(m_Db, sql);
00140   }
00141   sql = "commit;";
00142   execute(m_Db, sql);
00143 }
